info.description: This is a nice, simple theme for macrumors.com. My UserStyles submission.
info.additionalInfo: If this needs updated at all, email me hello@bradleyjones.co _______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ v 1.2 - June 11th, 2016 • Fixed article title color/size in feed. ______________________________________ v 1.1 - June 7th, 2016 • Fixed links to make them smaller. • Fixed article title to fit in page. ______________________________________ v 1.0 - June 6th, 2016 • We're live!
